Text: Wow, this remaster sounds completely different from the release I own. How come?
This is sourced from original vinyl mix for the first time.

The weird thing is, I didn't notice such a difference with the other 2012 remasters. Actually, I can hardly notice any difference on the other albums. But here, this is a different story. Some tracks sound completely new to me.

Thx a bunch for the link. Great help indeed. 

"Hot Rats: Reverts to the original vinyl mix for the first time--essential. But keep your old disc for the remix."

Exactly what I did. ;)

Zappa remixed and re-recorded portions of some of his best albums when they were first released on CD. Compare the versions of We're Only In It for the Money - the 1980s CD version sounded downright cheesy.
